p: United States of America vs. Prosper Depeleppes Felip Perell}Criminal Warrant
To the Sheriff or any Constable of said County.

Whereas S. L. Humphrey Master of the Bark Elderado has this day complained in writing under oath to the undersigned one of the Justice of the Peace in and for the said County that Prosper Deppeleppes and Felip Perell are Seaman under written contract and belong to the Bark Eldorado and now loading in the port of Tacoma and that they have willfully deserted said ship without fulfilling said contract.
Therefore, in the name of the United States you are commanded forthwith to apprehend the said Prosper Deppeleppes and Felip Perell and bring them before me to be dealt with according to law.
Given under my hand this 29th day of June A.D. 1886
